name: sith
description: - Create a `POST /sith` endpoint - That receives a simple json object:   ```json   {     "text": "This is my example sentence. Just for fun."   }   ``` - And responds with a simplified yoda speak simply switching every 2 words:   ```json   {     "sith_text": "Is this example my sentence. Arrgh. Uhmm. For just fun. Err..err.err."   }   ``` - it keeps the capital positions and the end of sentences - if a sentence doesn't contain even number of words, it leaves the last as is - always puts (one or two) random things at the end of sentences - if the input doesn't contain the text or its empty, respond with:   ```json   {     "error": "Feed me some text you have to, padawan young you are. Hmmm."   }   ```
